name: RARE VISITOR! Royal Canadian Air Force CC-138 Twin Otter at Calgary Springbank Airport [4K]
description:
A couple weeks ago, this Royal Canadian Air Force CC-138 Twin Otter paid a visit to Calgary. This visitor from 440 Squadron spent a few days at Calgary’s Springbank Airport, apparently giving some rides to Air Cadets.

The RCAF only has 4 of these planes and they’re based out of Yellowknife for transport and search and rescue operations up north, so they're not a common sight here at all. That, plus Springbank backgrounds, meant I had to go film a few of those flights for myself. Enjoy the video!

FLIGHT INFORMATION
Operator: Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF)
Aircraft: De Havilland Canada CC-138 Twin Otter (DHC6)
Livery: SAR yellow
Engines: 2x Pratt and Whitney Canada PT6A-27
Registration: 13804
Route: Springbank (YBW) - Springbank (YBW)
Callsign: VAMPIRE 4
Runway used: 26, 17, 08
Date filmed: April 2023
